languages.text: "Вера — это инструмент управления, но управления благотворного. Это контур безопасности, удерживающий разум от падения в скверну. Однако это не значит, что опека не может быть гнетущей, а забота — ведущей к деградации".

"Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."
languages.original_text: "Вера — это инструмент управления, но управления благотворного. Это контур безопасности, удерживающий разум от падения в скверну. Однако это не значит, что опека не может быть гнетущей, а забота — ведущей к деградации".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “信仰是一种控制的工具，但这种控制是有益的。它是用来保障安全的回路，防止心灵陷入腐化。不过，这并不是说被保护的人永远不会感到有压迫感，也并不是说被照顾的人永远都不会堕落。”
languages.original_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."

traits.locale_text: “信仰是一种控制的工具，但这种控制是有益的。它是用来保障安全的回路，防止心灵陷入腐化。不过，这并不是说被保护的人永远不会感到有压迫感，也并不是说被照顾的人永远都不会堕落。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La fe es una herramienta de control, pero es un control benévolo. Es como un circuito de seguridad que evita que la mente se suma en la corrupción. Eso no significa que la protección no pueda resultar opresiva ni que el cuidado no pueda llegar a ser degradante».
languages.original_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."

traits.locale_text: «La fe es una herramienta de control, pero es un control benévolo. Es como un circuito de seguridad que evita que la mente se suma en la corrupción. Eso no significa que la protección no pueda resultar opresiva ni que el cuidado no pueda llegar a ser degradante».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「信仰は支配の道具ですが、その支配は優しい類のものです。それは、心が腐敗に陥るのを防ぐ安全回路です。とはいえ、保護されることが決して抑圧にならないとか、配慮されることが決して腐敗につながらないというわけではありません」
languages.original_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰は支配の道具ですが、その支配は優しい類のものです。それは、心が腐敗に陥るのを防ぐ安全回路です。とはいえ、保護されることが決して抑圧にならないとか、配慮されることが決して腐敗につながらないというわけではありません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Glaube ist ein Werkzeug der Kontrolle, doch es ist eine gesunde Kontrolle. Es ist ein Sicherheitskreis, der das Abgleiten des Verstands in die Verderbtheit verhindert. Was jedoch nicht bedeutet, dass beschützt zu werden nicht unterdrückend sein kann oder dass umsorgt zu werden nicht zu Degeneration führen kann."
languages.original_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."

traits.locale_text: "Der Glaube ist ein Werkzeug der Kontrolle, doch es ist eine gesunde Kontrolle. Es ist ein Sicherheitskreis, der das Abgleiten des Verstands in die Verderbtheit verhindert. Was jedoch nicht bedeutet, dass beschützt zu werden nicht unterdrückend sein kann oder dass umsorgt zu werden nicht zu Degeneration führen kann."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La foi est un outil de contrôle, certes, mais ce contrôle est bienveillant. C'est un circuit de sécurité qui empêche l'esprit de céder à la corruption. Cela dit, cette protection peut être étouffante, tout comme il est possible de tomber dans la déchéance si l'on se laisse trop choyer. »
languages.original_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."

traits.locale_text: « La foi est un outil de contrôle, certes, mais ce contrôle est bienveillant. C'est un circuit de sécurité qui empêche l'esprit de céder à la corruption. Cela dit, cette protection peut être étouffante, tout comme il est possible de tomber dans la déchéance si l'on se laisse trop choyer. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."

languages.text: "İnanç bir kontrol aracı olsa da bu kontrol sevecendir. Zihnin yozlaşmışlığa sıçramasını engelleyen emniyet devresidir. Tabii bu, korunma eylemenin asla baskılayıcı olamayacağı veya önemsenmenin asla bozulmaya yol açmayacağı anlamına gelmez."
languages.original_text: "Faith is a tool of control, but that control is of a wholesome kind. It is a safety circuit preventing the mind from lapsing into corruption. Which, however, is not to say that being protected can never be oppressive, or that being cared for can never lead to degradation."

traits.locale_text: "İnanç bir kontrol aracıdır ancak bu kontrol sevecendir. Zihnin yozlaşmışlığa sıçramasını engelleyen bir emniyet devresidir. Bu demek değildir ki korunma eylemi asla baskılayıcı olamaz ama. Önemsenmek asla bozulmaya yol açamaz veya."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
